Posts.Content: Yes, I would like to know when it ends too! Started taking it in January and by March my wrists and knees would alternately freeze up in the middle of the night and the pain was horrendous. I quit it after then, but it's 4 months later and I still have attacks. What type of doctor should I see? Is there a class action lawsuit against this poison? Do I need to take arthritis meds now? I saw something on here that a Rheumatologist said it takes at least 6 months for this toxin to get out of your body.
Posts.Title: femara long term effects
